content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my back yard, talking with a friend on the phone.  i stood up and looked to the south to notice several strands of light streaking northeasterly.  the phenomenon indicated 10-15 strands of light at different levels.  when i first noticed it, i thought it was some sort of firework, but fireworks travel vertical arc outward from the center, and fall back down to the ground.  this phenomenon occurred horizontally/laterally.  the apparent fleet of starships traveled quickly from southwest to northeast in my line of sight.
content.summary: A streak of lights moving northeasterly, possibly a squadron (?) of ships??

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving at night over a small hill in reno nevada. no other cars around.
it was a strange fiery red tailed object in a clear night sky.  i thought maybe a metiorite entering atmosphere or something falling in from space burning.
slow moving firey red tails two of them as i got closer there were two red lights and a giant saucer shaped outlined object in the air.
it was crazy i couldnt beleive what i was seeing. i wanted to pull the car over and take a picture or video for proof. i was in awe and mesmerized. before i could pull over the object was just gone. disappeared in the clear night sky?
content.summary: Slow moving two long trails of firey red tails two red headlights and a giant outline of a very large saucer shaped object

content.detailedDescription: It was around 9:30 pm and i was sitting in my front yard talking to a friend. then i look over to my right facing north, and i though i had seen a meteor. but, at a second glance i noticed that the object was too low to the surface to be a meteor. what i saw was an aircraft that was disintegrating with burning fire coming from the rear with smoke trail as if it was heading for the ground to crash. the object then went out of view and into the horizon. but, it looked as if it was going to touch ground.
content.summary: Bright fireball with smoke trail behind it, like a burning jet, or crashing aircraft

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were sitting in my driveway and noticed a couple of lights in the sky and figured they were planes. as the began traveling eastbound, we noticed they had tails. we first thought they might be planes. because they were so close together thought it could be one object separated or damaged such as a plane crash. after watching for a couple of minutes we lost site of it behind some trees.
content.summary: 2 relish orange light traveling in the northern sky in an an easterly decending path

content.detailedDescription: Two fireballs one in front of the other were moving across the sky from nw to ne...Moving slow but showing steaks like a meteor but they were not meteors. they never lost altitude as they streaked across the sky.Not sure they were space debris or what. it's already on the az news tonight. it was seen from colorado to california....They never mentioned az yet. unfortunately i didn't grab my phone. i had no idea it would last so many seconds long. about 45 seconds or so.
content.summary: Not a ufo but a meteor like fireball. there were 2 streaking across the sky

content.detailedDescription: This time they stopped for a few seconds then flashed 3x when i pointed my laser then faded with a last flash before it disappeared.
content.summary: Stoped for a few seconds

content.detailedDescription: A coworker and myself were driving home from work, when he said to me, "what is that" i looked and saw a blue glowing orb with a white and blue glow and a white trail very slowly desending in the distance. it then slowly seperated into two orbs. we briefly lost sight from trees along the side of the freeway, for mabey 5 seconds. as soon as we had a clear view the objects, the light and the trail where gone. we were close to the town of oroville, which isnt far from beale airforce base. we were south bound on hwy 99 aclose to east gridley rd. we were both shocked and couldn't explain what we saw. i tried to record it on my cell phone but was to slow to react
content.summary: One glowing orb, slowly decending, split int two and then we lost veiw from the highway and when we had a clear view 5 seconds later it wad gone

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting on my patio that faces south. light in the sky moving from west to east... looked like plane lights at first the saw tail and sparks coming off. 
never seen anything like that in the area before. have seen meteors but this was different. gold/yellow burning. no sound. looked like a missile or 
i hate to say it... looked like a plane going down. 
it went far enough to the east that trees and houses obstructed view. 

i called everybody out to see they all saw and i could hear my neighbor from two doors down say "what the hell is that". 

this was not a meteor. seen lots of those.
content.summary: Looked like a missile rather than meteor sparks came off it.

content.detailedDescription: I been encountering them 3 to 4x a week. i lost count on how many reports i gave mufon but it takes time to file a report. they know if im looking up and see them around 9-10pm.
content.summary: Flashed when i pointed a laser

content.detailedDescription: on july 6th around 1am walked off porch towards street. we looked up and in southwest horizon noticed an object that should not have been there. it was low in the sky and brighter than anything else in the sky. watched for about 10 minutes and noticed it was slowly drifting lower on the horizon. went and got the binoculars and decided to drive and follow it. it was oval shaped with colored lights rotating in the middle section. even without the binoculars you could see the colored lights. it started drifting a little faster. drove from binghamton ny to johnson city ny (apx 4 miles)to get a better view. now it changed direction going north towards the broome county airport. watched it for about 2 1/2 hours. during this time it had smaller bright white lights that where orbiting around main craft. sometimes they disappeared then would reappear sporadically. further off,i could see a second craft that also had colored lights. but it was definitely farther north. since it drifted right by the airport i wondered if the air traffic controller was seeing this. it was right there at the airport.  also another craft came from the south and shoot across the the sky northbound. it was very fast moving and could not tell where it went. the other colored light crafts were still there when i went home.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Slow moving object had colored lights with small bright white objects that came in and out of craft.

content.detailedDescription: On friday i disclosed my spiritual distress to 1100 people on a community board after crying walking down the street. friday morning my security camera went down about 4 am. 8 am the police showed up knocking at my door. the post on the community board contained some legal disclosure. saturday my camera was still down. this camera is inward facing in my home so that it captures both entrances and most of my home. because i couldn't access it and i knew it was still live, i pulled the plug. the alarm system continues to function. i have not had any sort of ping on the sensors or an alarm trip but it did fail to disarm on sunday morning. saturday night at about 10:30 pm, there was a loud single boom to the north, followed by a loud single boom to the west. these did not sound like fireworks. at 10:41 pm, i received a text message from a man sleeping in his car. he told me he regretted leaving the homeless shelter. that's why i'm pretty sure he was feeling uneasy, too. i think he heard it but i didn't ask him. i had really uneasy feelings after we texted back and forth about some options (he did not come to my home). sunday morning when i got up the drain plug for the kitchen sink was in the living room. when i went to do laundry, there was bleach all over in the cupboard. the bottle was upright and intact. my post on the community board had some responses with some flagged for violation. i did not read any of the comments. i don't intend to read them. for whatever reason, i feel like this relates to your group. i don't know what makes me feel that way. i think i would like to express to this group that on saturday, i stopped taking cymbalta which is a drug which is notorious for it's withdrawal side effects. it would have been too soon on saturday for those sounds to be a side effect. i started having side effects on monday and i am experiencing them now. they are very intense today with some vertigo, stomach cramps and i am experiencing some audio hallucinations as well as insomnia. some sounds are amplified, like with a migraine but i don't have a headache. i keep thinking i hear a guy's voice. i started writing down the phrases i am hearing. i'm charting them in an excel document because it's the weirdest thing i've ever experienced. i never thought i would talk to myself in a man's voice but cymbalta is some pretty nasty stuff. i have no hallucinations with my depression. cymbalta isn't used for that. i haven't attempted any recordings. my security camera is working again. i'm asking for no contact and no follow up. if these issues i am experiencing are related to you in some way, please stop. why do i feel like this is you? withdrawal from this is scary stuff. i don't really feel like being the name on a bill for requiring drugs to list withdrawal side effects. i'm asking for some human decency for the next few weeks while i recover. thank you!
content.summary: 2 loud booms to the north and west

content.detailedDescription: Finishing dinner and watching movie. decide to let dog out back to pee. while outside saw what i thought was airplane. no wings or apparent "tail". also had what seemed to be transparent "bubble". thought, must be helicopter blades. realized too high to be helicopter and wrong shape/unusual color. called bf outside to see. only took eyes off craft for 1 sec but disappeared. ran up hill to see over house (couldn't have made it over house at speed i saw anyway) and couldn't find. by now we are both looking and saw another. this 1 is closer and going opposite direction. while we were watching another one (smaller/further away)appeared over it. bf keeps watching closer one while i watch farther one. both dissapear while we were watching them each respectively (they were going opposite directions). then we see appeared to military planes/jets that also disappeared, then possibly reappeared in other places. then saw another one of the white pill things appear and disappear (both of us witness at the same time). then saw another 2 planes (not disappearing just flying in general area over path of pill things). we also then both saw an actual airplane (white with wings and all)flying over path of first pill thing. disappeared near where the first pill thing did. lastly a final "pill thing" appeared and disappeared (both saw). in total 4 or 5 pill things. we are not druggies.We are not mentally ill. there were two small light clouds at the time but these were see thru and none of the objects disappeared into them. after the last object was seen the wind must have shifted because large dark clouds immediately moved into the area. by this time we had grabbed a phone to record but there was no more activity (and if it was still where most seemed to concentrate then we wouldn't have seen thru clouds anyway unless another low flying one showed up).... also, before i went outside i had a brief moment of ear ringing and dizziness. when i watched the first one (right before it disappeared) this repeated along with visual "chrome gnats". when bf saw his (first) he experienced the same along with seeing a transparent bubble open up in front of the craft before it disappeared. incedently these were the two low flying ones. we aren't crazy and i'm fairly certain we don't have brain tumors. i think i would like to remain anonymous because i am a nursing student and don't know if any potential employers could find out. we could draw pictures of crafts at a later date if anything comes if this and if it would be helpful. thank you.
content.summary: Strange white possibly glowing pill shaped objects appearing for short time and disappearing. regular aircraft also (two jets one plane that also disappeared) during and after.

content.detailedDescription: I hurd something outside and i looked out my front window and seen about 20 to 30 feet away at tree level in my yard a shift shaping red-orange object.After i took photoes i turned out all the lights in my living room and went to bed.I remeber going into my room but not getting in the bed.Its usally take me awhile to fall aslleep.This morning when i woke i went to look at the photos of the object and there was a dark black video i found.I left my pphone in the kitchen on the charger.The sonuds on the video are nothing ive hurd in my home before.And i had never seen the video.I also found the living room tv remote my lighter and a cigarette on the floor in my bedroom.
content.summary: Redish orange shipshape movement and hooverd for an hour or more.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i went for a walk on the boardwalk at sunken meadow beach park located in kings park, new york. the sunset and sky looked so beautiful that i was snapping some pictures. later on when i got home i was looking at the photos that i had taken and noticed an object in the sky in the distance from where we were taking the pictures. my husband stated to me that he thought he saw something but didn't say anything to me at the time. in the photo you can see it was hovering over the water stationary and not moving. i do believe that this is possibly a ufo. i don't see what else it could be but that. if you look at the photo you can clearly see that it is not a bird nor a plane. 

as you can see in the picture of the what are the clouds look like pink swirls or circles the object is in me sky near or above a man sitting playing his bongo drum.

i've attached another picture of the sunset that looks like there possibly could be another one near the sun or could be the same one.
content.summary: My husband and i went for a walk on the bloodwork at sunken meadow park in kingspark new york the sunset and sky was so beautiful that i took pictures

content.detailedDescription:
Flat or disc-shaped craft
report # 33


on thursday july 21, 2016 i took a random video that lasted 39 seconds at 15:28 dst.  during the video a flat or possibly disc-shaped craft travelled from frame 18:35 to 19:05, or ½ of a second.  the angle of rapid descent was at 14° from the right side of the frame to the left.  nothing else was seen in the remainder of the video.  the angle of elevation when it entered the screen was 12°, although it clearly came from much higher.

the direction of initial view was 350° or nearly north, and it disappeared from the camera view at 336° or nnw-- although it continued in a straight line ending at about 320° or nw where it likely ended its flight.  it disappeared on the west side of blue springs lake, interestingly, into another much smaller lake.

analysis:
in 16 frames, the craft covered a distance of .3 miles in ½ of a second, which converts to 2,160 mph.  most likely it entered the small body of water, although not actually seen doing so.  the direction of the 14° descent, by projection, ended nw at 320°.  this small lake is about 1600 feet west of blue springs lake.  the size of the object appears to be close to 15 feet when compared with the spheroid craft from mufon case # 61730.
content.summary: I saw a flat or disc-shaped craft descend very rapidly.

content.detailedDescription: Monday evening i was walking to my car during my lunch break. a storm had just past and the sun was setting. i decided i would snap a photo. the sun was blinding so i wasn't looking directly at it. i snapped the pic on my iphone then finished walking to my car. i received a phone call and completely forgot about the photo until i was flipping through my photos the next day. i noticed a spot on the picture. i tapped to zoom in and activated the "live" feature. the orb moved and quickly darted off the screen.  i never heard anything or saw anything. it was all captured in the photo. i don't know how to upload it in a way that it can be viewed "live"
content.summary: Orb in photo

content.detailedDescription:
On july 3rd, 2016 it was late at night about 10:45. i had to grab some tools from our new place to break down a table bc we were moving and needing to get it downstairs to throw out. on my way back just about after the bridge near the inlet of onondaga lake i saw this really bright large white orb that flashed at once - at first i thought it may have been a helicopter strobe light. 

however, when i started to get closer to the highway entrance at the end of henry clay blvd that loops around back to syracuse i was able to see it very vividly upclose while trying to drive safe and look at in in the car. it was quite large dark black/grey triangle object floating above the trees. it's profile was sleek and width of structure was suitable for movement throughout the inside of the craft. it had 3 distinctive large white lights on each corner of the triangle that appeared to be some type of propulsion balancing system and in the center of the triange was a pulsating red light which appeared to be its power source in the center of the ufo. it also had some couple small white flashing lights as well. 

it was floating there for a while till i entered the highway just passed the loop and as i continued to drive on the highway it was floating over the highway in a path toward the northeast direction of syracuse. the map depicts the direction. it disappeared once it got to a certain point in the darkness.

i was definitely close enough to know it definitely was a ufo and not a man made craft. it was very surreal experience! i wish i was in a good place to take a picture but then again i was distracted by this marvel that i didn't think to try to stop somewhere safe to capture it.
content.summary: Black triangle ufo sighting

content.detailedDescription:
Case translated to english from portuguese and emailed to l. flechtner, field investigator, to file a report.July 27, 2016 at mufon hq in newport beach,ca.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
introduction in inglês: 
besides these cases, there is also collegues i met two "not human beings". maybe reptilians or something else but they taught me some things about them. i met them personnally. i met seperately them and they passed me some knowledge. the first one i met in 2010. the second & last one i met in 2012. i never saw them again. the cam to me, passed me whatever they had to pass me (knowledge) and i never saw them again. the way they teach is not vocally - by words - but by mind. i was lucky because, for the last 20 years of my live, i studied spirituallity, so i was able to learn with them, to understant some things regarding them and earth. 
i was - kind of - born with some ability to "see before happens."

besides all the portuguese close encounters, the last one was on a summer 2013 in portugal - in the city of cascais where i saw a big "kind of cigar" - flying shape. it was big, it was moving slowly in the clear sky, just above the big supermarket called "jumbo - auchan" - in cascais, it's color was all metal color shine like stainless steel. it had no windows, it was just a big metallic shining giant look "cigar - shape" ufo. i tried to take it a picture because it was moving relaly slow but unfortunately i have no camera - just a cheap cell phone and nothing cam in october.

also just to say that: i don't use drugs, even i do not drink alcohol. i am vegetarian and i don't know if i have some kind of alien implant on me because when i was 13 years old, i was at the beach and felted something on my foot. later my mother redbourn me to an x-ray and i remember the doctor saying: 
your sun has somekind of small strange body inside his foot but it seems not to bother at all so, let's not operating him. i am 53 years old and know i never felt any pain related to this small body. maybe it was a needle from a fish? 
case 1
faro island beach faro august between 1986 and 1988

"almost 30 years after this incident, i remember having told a good friend of mine who politely refused to believe, because he did not believe in ufos;. doubted and tried to find a logical explanation for my true if not i gave a lot of importance because the beholder is witness to something that others do not see later, after a few days, he calls me and tells me.: 
i believe everything you told me, as a friend of my great confidence, just report a similar case with your on the same beach. now i believe you. "

the year is inaccurate, since nothing pointed about this my first report of a strange vessel at sea and two color gray aliens just a few meters away from me. 
faro beach on faro island in august. 1986 or perhaps 1988. 
i was on vacation with his family in august, the municipal campsite of faro, on the island of faro. in front of the park there is a road and across the beach. 
that night, i decided to spend a few moments on the beach, it had been during the day with his back to the sun, needed to refresh them. i walked on the beach at around 22h00, my idea was to sit by the sea, but after the first steps in the sand, i noticed that in front of me were two gray color figures, behind a small sand dune . i thought were two lovers of the night; they moved the two bodies quickly and compulsively in a movement always circular. i decided not to bother and stayed at the beginning of the beach in silence, sitting and i began to admire the sea; the lights via the sea: the lights, which were of various colors: from one side to the other moved: the left side to the middle and on the right, various colors of lights were in the middle. i thought were small fishing boats but after a few minutes, i asked myself: lights with different colors in the sea? for what? the lights were yellow, orange, blue and other colors and when were they changed color. i found it strange but as did not want to disturb the shadows that moved in front of me - very quickly - i decided to stay there. but i found strange since moved up so quickly and were indefinite bodies, i saw only two gray bodies to move quickly, in rotary motion, one over the other. suddenly, to my right, appears a couple of lovers who enters the beach, they were sideways to me at a distance of about 20 meters. these two lovers did not see me because the beach was deserted. they were taken steps slowly along the beach and stopped: i noticed that the man had a flashlight in his hand that turned and pointed to the sea ... 
at that time he points his flashlight into the sea, i thought: they will bother the two figures that are moving quickly behind the dune - even in front of me. and in that moment i look at the figures again that, in a split second, arose, and came together in a flash escaped to the left side of the beach covering about 200 meters in a second - or less - they 200 meters from the beach! two gray figures came together to form one figure and 1 second or less made about 200 meters from the beach in a straight line and then saw them jump from the beach to the road. 
i remember all this as if it were today, as i got up quickly, after only have time to move my head to keep up with the speed with which they moved sideways and saw them jump into the road but then ... i did not see anything, they disappeared. 
he did not know what to do, his heart was pounding, i was nervous and enormous questions in my mind, i decided to approach me now from the sea. quietly got close to the water, much to fear but wanted to watch those lights in the sea, i felt that they could have been related to the two super-fast figures gray color disappeared completely, leaving no trace. but the lights had already gone and when i approach the sea, i see what i think was a ship, a strange vessel was floating in the sea and was completely made of what appeared to be metal - new steel stainless metal natural color shine steel. a little moonlight (moon) took me to see this object that was in the sea. he had a kind of rivets around, it was not because boats have boat mast and boat shape. that none of this had and it was all made of what looked like bright stainless steel. 
all this made me even more curious and questions but no answers and fear, decide leave the beach and go to my tent camping. the track is fast, just a minute and you enter the park and when i arrive at the beginning of the beach, with the road in front of me and the campsite on the other side, very slowly, start to hear a sound coming from the left side (left side because now i was back to earth and not the sea) direction i saw the two figures gray to jump to the road. the sound seemed to be a metal object and had a certain rhythm, a certain measure. that sound made me look and see two figures side-by-side that i thought were two men to walk side by side as assertadamente two soldiers were without exchanging step, without delay each other or it forward step. all to the rhythm of the metal sound that was an object of the beings had with him and beat. for clothes, i thought that these were two beggars or two crazy but ... your clothes, what looked like rags of beggar, of various colors were and were these pieces of colors united to each other forming clothing: small pieces of fabric completely new and boiled bright color or joined to each other forming a costume for each. i found it strange, as they walked slowly as if robots, many erect, rigid and rights and with a certain measure by the subject of sound. i thought they had not seen me and finding it strange that clothing be as new and consists of numerous small color, decided to let them pass: that mommento not relate it to the figures from the beach, only i found it all very strange but i thought they might a crazy and evil by fear of them, i decided to let them pass. in front of me it was precisely the entrance of the park and when they playing that object came just ahead of the park in my direction âlgulo, one of them, which was the road side, looked at me for a second and then .. i caught the biggest susta of my life! even today, after these 30 years, i shudder, because the face that appeared to be human transfigured up and in that split second he looks at me - and that still did not stop his slow and certain cadence step - the face it was a monster! i not know how to describe! for only i had the courage to look for a second it was. the shock was so great that quickly hid: i was standing quickly and i remember saying: "ai" and a quick reflex downloaded myself thinking quickly, "let them go let them go -!. please do not hurt me !. i closed my eyes in fear and only mentalizava those words full of dread i was and after a few seconds, the long promenade that follows the road ... they were gone the sound was over and they disappeared the only thing i remember hearing in my mind - was later:. "forgets what you have seen!" 
the face of these things made me, it was just to scare me. 
and in fact, i never went back to that beach. to date, there never was. 
the next day, in the morning, even i asked my cousin which measures roughly 2 meters tall, long legs he has and how he played basketball, i asked him for it go the point i saw the aliens to the point of the end of beach where we left them to see. said to him, runs this route in the sand as quickly as possible, as if you were running to a goal. he asked me why and i told him, just run as soon as possible. he ran and calro that obviously it took much longer than the aliens to travel the same path: one second - if that was what the aliens took the travels that path of about 200 meters. of course my cousin would never run 200 meters in a second ... but i honestly still do not want to believe it all. 
only 10 years after this close encounter, i began to dedicate myself to spirituality. and obviously that reporting this to only a few people, everyone laughed at me but later a friend of mine who did not believe in ufos, one day, i decided to tell you this true story. in the end he did not believe but past days, his friend was just telling her about strange lights in the sea, on the same beach on the island of faro. already a friend of mine told me that some fishermen were afraid to talk about it, maybe talk to a lot of fear, only the influence of alcohol, after drinking a good amount of alcohol (wine or beer) and then one or another fisherman spoke of strange lights in the same location. 
this my friend who did not believe in ufos, came to believe and found it interesting that he already knows the mufon. i did not know it was a chance - i will say i know your organization, because it was through a video channel history i saw the name of your organization and then decided to contact you. 
this was my first encounter. 
here are now others. 

case 2 
the clawed alien to me and alien in switzerland - sion may 2009 
for many years of my life, even when i was younger, i knew i could guess the future, i, after studying spirituality, assubntos knew that no one else knew. 
where does all this spiritual and information about the earth or information about a specific event? 
these questions - as well as others, such as the power to heal people and children with cancer and other ailments, somehow born or were past me but ... how? 
my spiritual learning i believe i have not been enough to do so. 
basically, since again, i always felt i was receiving aliens information - directly on me, i had any kind of connection with extraterrestrial beings - they passed me information. i went to many spiritual masters to explain me what was wrong with me but ... none could tell me what i had in me. 
i thought even one day have to go to a priest to bless me or do any kind of exorcism but never got to do any of this.

. "in 2009, for months, i felt my very stuck energy, it was as if my soul was missing me i decided to make a pmt query:. a pyramidal technique that was invented by a swiss - i believe i explained to the therapist i was without vital energy for some time after the end of the consultation, the therapist tells me.: 
"you had an extraterrestrial being grabbed you, to suck or to wear your life energy. this is why he felt no energy. i sent be away, pulled it from itself. the being was not bad but the energy et this being is very strong. this is why you know so much. " 
i was happy because already felt better, but a little sad too, because that is, the distance it was, passed me a lot of wisdom. after days, i went to switzerland with alice - a friend of mine portuguese-swiss nationality. 
we were in sion, one of those hot days. sion valley - city of french canton is called "california sion". this name is given because of the high temperatures in the summer can reach and ultrapasssar 42 degrees. this was one of those hot days. i was at the bar drinking just a sip of wine to make company to alice my friend, her mother and stepfather. i do not drink, never liked alcohol and not smoking drugs. in a conversation i little understood in french, after about 30 minutes, my friend, comes up to me and whispers the following: 
- do not look now to your left side but is a man i do not know whether a man or a man disguised alien to do some very strange questions to a customer here restaurant.

covertly and slowly, without trying to attract attention, i looked at the strange man (who was standing) ... i realized it was no man, felt it was not human. he was dressed normally as if the heat would affect not: 
his face was not transpired, the skin even shone, he was very calm and the temperature that day reached 43 degrees and the time, did not bother him; not a drop of sweat or skin glowing. he was asking questions for us humans are strange questions and never do. 
the questions: 
"what do you feel when it's cold? 
how do you feel when it's hot? 
how it is that you temperature difference affects? 
how do you feel the temperature differences? "

obviously that man (the restaurant customer) that was being questioned, nothing strange to those questions, since it was already a little "spilled" by the effect of the wine which took involved in the heat completely impossible to bear; all inclusive people i was perspiring. but i found it all very strange, and after looking at this being, man dress, told my friend alice in a low voice: 
"he's not human, is alien." 
and in that moment, the strange being realized our conversation, he felt that we were talking about it and calmly remained standing without moving, without the eye but when i looked again, their eyes were turned forward, started looking at my side but jogging covertly as you face when you do not want to attract attention only that his right eye looked at me and was moving like an eye of a chameleon. 
this was an alien i met identify that - as is normal in aliens, they try to stay calm, since many do not suffer from human emotions.
content.summary: Several sightings in portugual

content.detailedDescription:
The night of tuesday, july 26, 2016, i was up late watching a movie. i cannot state where i live as i also work there, and any mention of the organization i work for by name gives them the right to own this report, but i can say i am a fire lookout. my job is almost entirely encompassed by watching for things and locating them, including aircraft and weather patterns. my location is isolated to the point that only two stationary man-made lights are visible from my position and both of them were in a different direction then the objects witnessed.

at about 22:30 i had to go to the bathroom and walked out onto the catwalk of my fire lookout and noted a white light with red and green flashing lights to the north just off the horizon. i assumed it to be an airplane, but took note of it because it was not on the general metropolitan to metropolitan flight paths that cross over my area, and it appeared significantly lower than standard planes. the lights were also brighter and larger than standard far-off commercial airliners. the lights were in fact brighter than any star, planet, or other craft in the night sky at the time. no clouds were visible in the sky along any horizon, and i had a clear view of the distant object and stars.

i went back into the lookout and finished my movie, and at about 23:00 i went out on the catwalk to brush my teeth and noted the object was still there and appeared to have not moved at all. this surprised me, as neither airplanes nor satellites stay in the same place for that period of time. after brushing my teeth i returned inside and looked at it through binoculars briefly, then pulled out my spotting scope and fixed on the object at 60x. i cannot accurately gauge the object’s distance without a horizon and since it was just lights on a dark background, but judging by the increase in size of the object through the spotting scope, if it were equivalent to a 60 foot drop ship i would estimate it to be 30 to 50 miles away with an exact azimuth of 22.2 degrees from my position (as measured with an osborne fire-finder 1934 model). the object was kite like in shape, but narrower side to side and longer top to bottom. it had a white/orange light in the center similar in color to an old halogen headlight, with a red light below and right of the white/orange one, and a green light above and left of it. the object itself was dark, and i can only estimate at its shape due to the visible light emitted from the white/orange light. the white/orange light remained constant but the green and red lights were strobes and alternated their flashing in a consistent pattern. as this is the standard pattern for commercial aircraft, i then wondered if this was a helicopter and my mind was simply making the shape with the visible light it could see. within the 60x magnification of my spotting scope however, the object did not move out of the frame from 23:00 to 00:00. that would require an object to remain absolutely still, uncharacteristic of helicopters.

at midnight is when i witnessed its only visible change. at midnight exactly, another object entered the sky while i was looking through the scope, so i did not see it immediately when it became visible, but it was there when i brought my eye up from the scope. i noted the time at exactly 00:00. it was below the previously listed object, slightly to the right, and did not come more than a few degrees above the horizon at any given time. i also looked at this object through the spotting scope. the shape appeared to be two isosceles triangles facing down, connected together at the widest point. the color was red at the top, orange in the center, and yellow at the bottom, with these three colors seeming to be lit up in a repeating wave pattern from top to bottom. one triangle was dark while the other was lighted, and once one triangle went through its lit cycle of red-orange-yellow, it went dark and the other one repeated the cycle. the rhythm of this light show of the two triangles was extremely fast. the right triangle appeared in full and to perfection as i could see all three corners; however when the left triangle lit up its top right corner was cut off at an angle. this leads me to believe the right triangle was closer than the left, and the object was slightly turned away from me so i was not viewing it straight on. this object was either significantly closer or larger in size than the previously listed kite-shaped object, as i could make out its pattern and shape clearly and distinctly with the naked eye, and it filled the spotting scope to a greater degree. upon first viewing, this object was rising upward slowly, stopped, hung at a single point without moving for exactly two minutes, then at 00:02, dropped below the horizon. during the two minutes the double-triangle shaped object was in the air, the kite-shaped object previously listed in this report, rose in the sky nearly 20 degrees (measured with an osborne fire-finder) straight up at the exact same azimuth it was at previously. the osborne fire-finder can observe a tenth of a degree change for any given azimuth, and the kite shaped object did not move a tenth of a degree.

i remained awake until 01:30 hours when i had to fall asleep as i had work the next day. i am accustomed to waking early so i was already quite tired. the kite shaped object was still in the sky and still located in its second position listed in this report. i awoke at 07:30 and the object was no longer visible. no sounds were audible from either object during the event.
content.summary: Saw two objects with assumed interaction/effect on each other for long duration

content.detailedDescription: Driving west bound on route 50 toward washington,dc when i saws a huge ball of fire light up the northern sky it was dropping straight to earth. so i stopped my car on the shoulder of the roadway andrew air force base was just a few miles away to the south west.  there was no other vehicle traffic on the road east or west bound. i looked north bound the ball of fire was still falling the flames started to get smaller until huge pale yellow sphere emerged from the flames it glowed the color of the sun, it had holes evenly space all around the spare craft they covered the craft all over the surface they ten feet deal with flames about ten feet high coming out of them it appeared  to be hydrogen powered. the sphere craft came to a stop in the air about two thousand feet and began traveling south bound straight for me it never made a sound. the sphere craft flew directly above my head the flames had gone out but it still traveled sooth bound flying on it own making no noise, glowing the pale yellow like the sun in a midnight blue sky looking south bound traveling straight it had to have flown right past andrews air force base still no vehicle traffic on route 50. no planes air traffic of any kind in the sky. the sphere craft continued flying south bound gradually arming up until it disappeared in to the heavens.
content.summary: Saw a ball of dropping down toward earth in the northern sky it started decelerating and the flames reseeded it was a sphere it stopped about two thousand feet and started traveling south bound toward me it flew directly over my head not making a sound

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to my friends van to retrieve a gallon of water when i saw 2 objects that appeared to be stars moving across the skys at a medium rate of speed the objects where sphere shapes and glowing very bright.
content.summary: I went out to my friends van to retrieve a gallon of water as i looked up to the sky i saw two objects which i assumed were stars but upon second glance they were to low in the sky to be stars and they moving across the sky glowing the objects finally dis

content.detailedDescription: Same object we had seen last year. a really bright white light came into view from the right, and continued to the left (south to north) in line with our roof until it was obstructed by the trees. the video is terrible. i couldn't  steady the camera and its very pixally, but it did not blink. there was no sound. just glided and didn't change shape and the light stayed the same the whole time. i looked through binoculars, saw no blinking lights.
content.summary: Ball of pure white light

content.detailedDescription:
hello. this is austin located out of north carolina. there have been many times people have claimed to have seen ufos; myself being among that group. although i believe the first real time i ever saw one was back one night in february of 2016, the girl i was dating at the time was with me. we were in the car one night around 01:00-03:00; parked around the corner from her house. it was extremely dark, we were stargazing; which we did quite often. then she said “look it’s a ufo” (jokingly) i began observing it. it was a bright white light that would dim and get brighter and every time it would get brighter these two smaller rid lights would form right underneath it, creating a triangle. *i realize that this sounds cliché*. then it disappeared and appeared at a different location in the sky southeast of the original location, slightly brighter and flashing a little faster before it would disappear again appearing northeast of the new location about thirty seconds after it vanished, once more it was brighter and flashing faster; at this point the two red lights that appeared forming the triangle were more visible. it vanished once more, reappearing shortly after southwest of the original location, it was much brighter. so bright some of the light thrown off of it was actually causing shadows inside of the vehicle as if someone had pulled out a flashlight. my heart was pounding at this point, it was no longer a joke anymore. it vanished, i began to relax because it had been minutes since i had seen in. then right above and northwest to its original location it appeared. a blinding white light with two large glowing red lights (although much dimmer than the main one) below it forming the triangle. i continues to watch it frozen in awe as it got brighter. it appeared to be moving closer; taking no evasive measure to disappear; it was at this point my girlfriend was yelling at my to crank the car and drive off; i did so putting it in reverse and whipping it around, we left the location. i have not returned since. 
         almost one week ago, i was doing research on this topic; and got a good amount of information. i went to sleep this night and found myself running in my dream, no clothes on, covered in some sort of filth, i was constantly turning my head while running but i never saw what i was running from. it was on a landscape i had never seen before, barren, flat, rocks, hills, and mountain ranges in the distance. while running i remember seeing images carved into the rocks and ground. i woke up about 04:21 freezing and drenched in sweat and opened my eyes and for a brief second, not even long enough for i my eyes to focus; i saw a face, not human. next thing i know its 10:00 in the morning and i’m awake. i promptly began drawing a sketch of the face i saw and some of the images i saw before i lost them from memory. i will be including pictures of this.
content.summary: Ufo sighting

content.detailedDescription: jose here from bay area northern california. basiclly around 9:00pm last night here in hayward ca i left my house with my girlfriend to go to the store. as i was driving down the street we noticed at first what was two red lights just static glowing in the middle of the sky it wasent moving. they were bright two red glowing orbs. the. as we pulled out the camera the lights turned green and they blinked repeatedly. the. the lights take off to the east and stop again in the middle of the sky. from my vantage point i was directly below it before it turnes green and we did. not see anything solid from which the lights could be eminating from. heres the video. shortly after the video the lighta continued down south east the. dissapeared.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Looked like bright green glowish pulsating lights that traveled fast speeds and ability to stop instantly

content.detailedDescription:
I had been observing the sky out back of my house. when i went in and opened my front door, looking n.E. i saw what i took to be the moon obscured by passing clouds.  on looking to my right i was surprised to see the real moon, in a clear patch of sky. this was roughly 90 degrees away in the s.E. the strange light was just that, a light. no sound, no movement, nq action. it just looked like a second moon covered in cloud.
 as the clouds moved over it, it sometimes appeared as a dumb bell shape, sometimes round, depending on the clouds. i waited for the cloud to move away which took a few minutes even though there was a lot of clear sky about. eventually the clouds slowly peeled away but revealed no source of the light, just dark empty sky. i was baffled and have never seen anything quite like this before. when the clouds moved back over the same piece of sky, the light reappeared. this lasted over an hour. there was no visible beam shining onto this patch either from above or below and i still cannot account for what i saw. the light was coming from fairly low cloud so i assumed the light source to be fairly local but apparently untraceable.
minutes previously to this i had seen another strange object zip over my house at high speed in the direction of where i saw the light but i did not assume the two things to be connected. this happened in a split second and i am not too sure of what i did see. the light however was very clear and as bright as a full moon behind thin cloud and lasted over an hour without moving.
 i phoned a friend and told him about it and he said he also saw it at the time. unfortunately, since then,his testimony of what he saw has proved unreliable and i cannot be sure he witnessed the actual phenomenon.  i took a photo on my mobile but it is disappointing.
content.summary: Unaccounted light shining through clouds

content.detailedDescription: As reported to asd by phone: "i am a deputy sheriff and was on patrol when i noticed a glowing white object moving just above the tree line approximately 250 yards from my position. i stopped the vehicle near the junction of 42 and 28 hwy and observed this object moving in a general direction from sw to ne, however, it made several erratic and quick movements to the left, right, and backwards, then forward once again. these movements are not something normally observed with typical aircraft such as a helicopter of plane. it appeared to be about the size of a small engine aircraft or slightly smaller, but was just a glowing ball of white light with no structure and no sound. if it had been an aircraft i would have heard a sound from the distance it was from me. i was alone and did not think to get a photo but wish i had now because it was very bright and would have shown up in the photograph. i heard about the sightings in this area and wanted to tell someone that there is something going on in this area. i did see a ufo in the fall of 2014 which was a disc shaped dark metallic gray color with small white lights on it, but have not seen anything before or since except for this recent one. i've also heard about a number of sightings people are seeing in this area from many years back to today."
content.summary: Observed a glowing sphere making erratic turns at treetop level

content.detailedDescription: When i have time at work, i go up on my companies roof and watch for satalites or the space lab. while looking se, i noticed an object moving at a very high rate of speed moving from the se to the nw. i first saw it about 30 degrees above the horizon. it was goldish in color, and it's brightness was about half that of mars. it traveled towards the nw very fast, and when it was overhead it made a unbelievable "s" shape maneuver and then it was gone. there was no noise like a jet would make, and it happened around the same time the cameras on the space lab showed a "ufo".
content.summary: looking for satalites that night like i have been doing all my life.

content.detailedDescription:
i was on my porch watching the crescent, day moon as well as the sky and clouds. i'd normally be watching anime or something else inside like using my computer but, we had no internet at the time for some people working somewhere nearby.I noticed the object after i shifted my eyes slightly to the right then to a cloud when i was looking at the moon. it was flying in an open spot, right above our bradford pair tree then flown west, northwest above a cloud and that's when i lost it.
  when i first saw it, i thought,"no, it couldn't be one, could it?". before i even saw it, i was thinking about how nice would it be to see a ufo at that moment, on this sunny day. "but for me to think that just before seeing that object would be almost unheard of normally wouldn't it?", i had thought after seeing it. i wanted to think out all possibilities before truly believing it was a real ufo. i live near a military base, so we hear a bunch of sounds and see a bunch of crafts flying overhead.In fact i think i even heard a ufo before, a few years ago while taking my dog outside, early morning/late at night. but dismisses it for it sounded too much like a jet yet sounded too short and closer to the ground.
  after losing sight of the ufo, i first talked to my neighbor.Then texted and talked to a friend of mine on messenger about it. he talked about military drones and i looked them up, but none looked like the one i saw, i even took sky pictures in case people wanted to know what the weather was at the time.
  the object was definitely metallic and reflective, it almost looked white for it was close enough to the clouds to reflect them. it was an oval, disc shape but i think that was only so since it was flying on its side in the sky. it also may have slightly moved while flying but it was hard to tell for i am near-sighted, if a far sighted person saw it, they would have definitely seen the whole thing in much more detail and clearly. if i had to guess the type of ufo i saw , it would be the common movie,flying disc type or something similar. when it flew through the sky, it made no sound or anything else, it only flew towards and over a cloud.And the directions it flew towards was a bit difficult to actually tell but west to northwest.
  i didn't feel too excited or anything else during and after the experience as i think anything is possible in this world and thought if it was a ufo, that it was pretty cool that i finally saw one.
content.summary: I was only sky watching, mainly watching the creacent day moon on my porch and to my right it appeared, flying. it dissappeared behind a cloud.

content.detailedDescription:
1, going to bed
2,always take a look at the sky at night
3,seen it before is same area, but the lights were different, the lights before were white, like a foot ball stadium in the sky, had checked the maps to see if a factory was in that area, but no.
4,no actions, just there for about 15 mins, prevously with white lighs
seen it for up to 2 hours.
5,&,6,feelings,this time i felt were that, it knew i was watching, cause just as i had that thought, it moved away, to a dot, and was gone.
content.summary: Round with lights
